snippet: AT&T on Thursday clarified the limitations of its "unlimited" data plan. Here's what you need to know so you don't exceed AT&T's limits and see your data connection reduced to something unusable.
abstract: AT&T on Thursday clarified the limitations of its "unlimited" data plan. Here's what you need to know so you don't exceed AT&T's limits and see your data connection reduced to something unusable.

headline.main: Have An 'Unlimited' Data Plan With AT&T? Tips on Watching Your Data Usage
